mapper.sql: OPERATE_ID, STAFF_ID, SOURCE, MENU, START_DATE, END_DATE, OPERATE_TYPE, OPERATE_STATUS,PHY_EQP_ID,NOTES
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO BP_OPERATE_LOG ( STAFF_ID, SOURCE, MENU_NAME, START_DATE, OPERATE_TYPE, OPERATE_STATUS ,REMARK ) VALUES ( #{staffId}, #{source}, #{menu}, NOW(), #{operateType}, #{operateStatus} ,#{notes} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM GLCS_OPERATE_LOG P,GLCS_STAFF S,GLCS_OPERATE_TYPE L
S.STAFF_ID = P.STAFF_ID AND P.OPERATE_TYPE = L.OPERATE_TYPE
AND P.OPERATE_ID IN
#{ids}
ORDER BY P.START_DATE DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE BP_OPERATE_LOG T SET T.END_DATE = NOW(), T.OPERATE_STATUS = #{status, jdbcType=INTEGER} WHERE T.ID = #{operateId, jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select t.operate_type,t.operate_type_name from GLCS_OPERATE_TYPE t where t.operate_type not in (114,115,116,117,118,119,120,123,124,127,128,129,130,131,132,133,134,135,136,137,138,139,140,141,142)
SELECT OPERATE_NAME FROM BP_OPERATE_TYPE WHERE OPERATE_TYPE = #{operateType}

SELECT P.OPERATE_ID, S.NAME, S.STAFF_NBR, P.SOURCE, P.MENU, TO_CHAR(P.START_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:mi:ss') START_DATE, TO_CHAR(P.END_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:mi:ss') END_DATE, P.OPERATE_TYPE, DECODE(P.OPERATE_STATUS,1,'成功',2,'失败',3,'操作中') OPERATE_STATUS, L.OPERATE_TYPE_NAME, P.NOTES FROM GLCS_OPERATE_LOG P, GLCS_STAFF S, GLCS_OPERATE_TYPE L where P.STAFF_ID = S.STAFF_ID AND P.OPERATE_TYPE = L.OPERATE_TYPE and P.OPERATE_TYPE not in (114,115,116,117,118,119,120,123,124,127,128,129,130,131,132,133,134,135,136,137,138,139,140,141,142)
AND P.START_DATE >=to_date('${firstTime}','YYYY-MM-DD')
AND P.START_DATE <=to_date('${lastTime}','YYYY-MM-DD')
AND S.STAFF_NBR like '%${staffNbr}%'
ORDER BY P.START_DATE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO HIS_PUB_OPERATE_LOG (OPERATE_ID, STAFF_ID, SOURCE, MENU, START_DATE, END_DATE, OPERATE_TYPE, OPERATE_STATUS, CREATE_TIME ) VALUES (#{operateId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{staffId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{menu,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{operateType,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{operateStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SYSDATE )
